The State of Texas decided to have all-White pre-primaries, and,  again, people of color could not vote in those primaries. He went back  to the Supreme Court. The Supreme Court said: Texas, we just told you  that you can't have all-White primaries. So now we tell you that you  can't have all-White pre-primaries.
